title: Atlas
content: [!infobox|right ] Atlas !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Young Adult | | Gender | Female | | Race | =this.race | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Boab | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Atlas History Highlights

title: Desmond
content: [!infobox|right ] Desmond !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | =this.age | | Gender | =this.gender | | Race | =this.race | | Condition | =this.condition | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | =this.standing | | Location | =this.location | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Desmond History Highlights

title: Elric
content: [!infobox|right ] Elric Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Teenager | | Gender | Male | | Race | Tiefling | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | 3 | | Class(es) | Warlock | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Boab | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Elric History Bad Company first came across Elric on their way to the city of Brass. Elric was being attacked by creatures while he attempted to retrieve a bag he had hidden in the area. After defeating them, Elric gave the party assistance in entering the city, and getting them to someone who may know information on Dawnbringer, as-well as the piece of Godsbane. At one point, Elric brought the party back to his home, and they met his mother - whom was suffering from a genetic disease. Arthur proceeded to heal her of her affliction with his Lay on Hands, and they mentioned the possibility of helping Elric escape the Elemental Plane of Fire on their way out. Highlights

title: Bento
content: [!infobox|right ] Bento Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Unknown | | Gender | Male | | Race | Demon | | Condition | Dead | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Mount Franz | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Leo Dentelli | Subordinate (former) | Bento History Bento was a demon commanded by Demon Lord Orcus. He - along with Leo Denteli - attempted to stop Bad Company on their quest to find Godsbane, but was eventually slain on the peak of Mount Franz during their fight to save Irridanel from catastrophe. Highlights

title: Eve
content: [!infobox|right ] Eve !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Unknown | | Gender | Female | | Race | Demon | | Condition | Dead | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Orcus | Master | Eve History Highlights

title: Gert
content: [!infobox|right ] Gert !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | Fighter | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Amelia | Mother | | Bert Sr. | Father | | Bert Jr. | Brother | Gert History The party encountered Gert outside of Drovic, after he and a group of men attempted to kill the "merchant" Antony, whom was attempting to scam the party with bad goods. Gert had bought an "enhancement" potion from him, which did not work in the bedroom. A letter was found on him that mentioned that Asmodeous's (the king of hell and god of indulgence) mount Twilight Phoenix is real. Gert was last seen running back into Drovic, after his defeat by the party. Highlights

title: Kent
content: [!infobox|right ] Kent Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | Fighter | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Kent History Kent, the Red Skull Bounty Hunter, was a former associate of Hayn Underfoot. Hayn's brother Eran Underfoot died after Hayn gave Kent information on some valuables in Eran's possession. He later reappeared in Drovic, appearing as a unknown bounty hunter ambushing Hayn and Arthur Maynard after their search for a hidden smuggled object. During the ensuing fight, Kent took a civilian hostage before falling unconcious from an airborne attack from Hayn. After finding out of Kent's identity, he and Arthur traveled outside of Drovic, planning to interrogate him at their fort just outside the city. Highlights Killed Hayn Underfoot's Eran. Knocked out in Drovic by Hayn.

title: Orcus
content: [!infobox|right ] Orcus Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Ancient | | Gender | Male | | Race | Demon | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | =this.location | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Bento | Subordinate | | Leo Denteli | Subordinate (former) | | Eve | Subordinate | Orcus History The Demon Lord Orcus is a demon that threatens Franzictini, and is currently being sought after by Bad Company. Little is known about him, but he once employed the demon Bento, as-well as subjugated the undead monk Leo Denteli. The party seeks the fragments of the legendary god slaying weapon Godsbane, in hope of defeating him. Highlights

title: Epiphren Ramsey
content: [!infobox|right ] Epiphren Ramsey Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Half-Orc | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | 15 | | Class(es) | Paladin,Barbarian | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Boab | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Epiphren Ramsey History The party first met Epiphren in Vindor, where the majority of the party first came together. There, he helped the party until a large force of Orc's began pillaging from the Wild Lands, to the north; Here, he split from the party, his fate unknown until they met with him again. Epiphren now primarily stays in the small community of Boab, where he assists the community using his unusual strength. Highlights

title: Artagan
content: [!infobox|right ] Artagan Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Ancient | | Gender | Male | | Race | Satyr | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Neutral | | Location | Unknown | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Artagan History Artagan was the patron of Tarin Bolirahn. After Tarin refused to give up the fragment of Godsbane to him, Artagan severed their pact. Highlights

title: Cyric
content: [!infobox|right ] Cyric Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Ancient | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Unknown | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Mask | Adversary | Cyric History The God Cyric, once a human man, is the current patron of Armmyr Dopplet. He has a hostile relationship with the God Mask, whom he had used in the form of a weapon known as Godsbane. Highlights

title: Mask
content: [!infobox|right ] Mask Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Ancient | | Gender | Male | | Race | =this.race | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Neutral | | Location | Unknown | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Cyric | Adversary | Mask History Mask appeared before Hayn as a small halfling man during their visit to Anaheim, after knowledge of his brother Eran's appearance in the city. Mask had enlisted the party to break into a vault, belonging to Vidorant, and retrieve a relic known as The World - a palm sized globe with the ability to temporarily control the flow of time. After successfully stealing the globe, the party attempted to sneak out of the city when he reappeared to the party. He said that he would allow the party to keep it, but that they must not allow it to get into the hands of Cyric. Highlights

title: Raven Queen
content: [!infobox|right ] Raven Queen Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Ancient | | Gender | Female | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Neutral | | Location | Unknown | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Raven Queen History Hayn was granted powers by the Raven Queen in exchange for him returning souls to her. During the parties trip to Drovic for the King's Ball, Hayn was instructed to go to the top of the largest archer tower and release 3 souls he had collected to her. In exchange, he was granted the ability to summon a reaper once a day. Highlights Granted Hayn a boon, allowing him to summon a reaper once a day.

title: Irygl
content: [!infobox|right ] Irygl Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Female | | Race | Satyr | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | 10 | | Class(es) | Druid | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Boab | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Irygl History The party first encountered Irygl when searching for her in search of a cure for the plague surrounding Vindor. Eventually they learn that the pestilence was caused by Orcus, and to defeat him they must rebuild the weapon known as Godsbane. She would help the party on their journey, until eventually settling in the small forest village of Boab. Highlights

title: Korbin Dopplet
content: [!infobox|right ] Korbin Dopplet Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Young Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | 15 | | Class(es) | Fighter | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Irridanel | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Armmyr Dopplet | Brother | Korbin Dopplet History Korbin is the brother of Armmyr Dopplet. At some point, Korbin managed to get bit by a werewolf - contracting lycanthropy. The party managed to cure him of his affliction. The party met up with Korbin again at Irridanel, during the crisis at Mount Franz and subsequent battle with Inchcomb. Korbin is now an impromptu leader of Irridanel. Highlights

title: Leo Denteli
content: [!infobox|right ] Leo Denteli Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Half-Elf | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | 7 | | Class(es) | Monk | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Boab | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Leo Denteli History Little is known of Leo's prior life before encountering Bad Company. It is known that Leo went into service with Orcus after being promised his wife - whom had previously died. After being defeated by Bad Company, Orcus resurrected him by implanting a horn in his head; this horn would later removed by Kril during the parties fight with Bento. Here, he joined the party to help with the search of Dawnbringer and the fragment of Godsbane. Highlights Caused the disappearance of the village of Boab, home of Tarin Bolirahn and partner Atlas. Horn of Orcus pulled from his head by Kril during Bad Company's fight with Bento.

title: Miscellaneous Characters
content: Relationships Eran Underfoot, brother of Hayn Underfoot - Killed by Kent prior to the start of the campaign. Enemies Idrisir, a grand wizard who resided in a tower in the city of Brass. Kept a Unicorn captive, which the party freed. The party broke into his tower, ultimately killing him on their way back out of the Elemental Plane of Fire. Kan Regz, a hobgoblin serving Bane, God of Tyranny. Killed by the party in the underdark under Covin. Given reward by Lord Redowith. Shopkeeper's Antony Castillo, hispanic-looking "shopkeeper" who pretended to have useful goods outside Drovic. Caused a fight with some off-duty guards, including Gert, whom he sold a fake boner potion. Andor Castillo, hispanic-looking Antony's brother. Bard of King Drovic IV. Met during the King's Ball, and subsequently rescued after he had been taken. Guards Gert, guard who attacked the party outside of Drovic. Political Lord Redowith, a lord of Covin. Rewarded the party with invitations to the King's Ball in Drovic after they defeated Kan Regz, a local hobgoblin leader.. Other Remirez Castillo, hispanic-looking, father of both Antony and Andor; part of the crew that created the Manawar Armada, the large airship that patrols around Drovic. Worked alongside it's inventor, Hominom^Remirez Hominom Dryadalis, inventor of the Manawar Armada, worked alongside Remirez. Banished from Drovic after refusing to cease experiments. Kept a journal, titled: "Divinity - The Original Sin". A unicorn, freed by the party on their way out of the city of Brass. Held captive by a wizard, Idrisir. Afterwards, this unicorn decided to reside in the Great Forests surrounding Boab, acting as it's protector.

title: Morvello
content: [!infobox|right ] Morvello Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | Paladin | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | Arthur Maynard | Adopted Son | Morvello History Morvello was first encountered during the parties journey to Cape Renozo. It would eventually be known that he had contracted lycanthropy, and had been leaving the city during full moons to avoid killing innocents. Highlights

title: Ashai
content: [!infobox|right ] Ashai !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Unknown | | Gender | Female | | Race | Human | | Condition | Dead | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Hostile | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Ashai History Lady Gwena was the right hand and court mage of King Drovic IV, King of Drovic. During the King's Ball in Drovic, the party noticed a coloration of her eyes and face, and she teleported away during a sudden fight from the cult. The party later encountered her again in the sewer, as her real form - Ashai, daughter of the Twilight Phoenix. The party defeated her in their fight in the sewers. Highlights

title: King Drovic IV
content: [!infobox|right ] King Drovic IV !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | =this.age | | Gender | =this.gender | | Race | Human | | Condition | =this.condition | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | =this.standing | | Location | Drovic | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | King Drovic IV History The party first encountered King Drovic IV during the King's Ball, after being invited by Lord Redowith. Highlights

title: Craig
content: [!infobox|right ] Craig Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Unknown | | Shop | Traveling Merchant | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Craig History Craig is a traveling merchant that Bad Company occasionally stumble into. Stumbled across Craig again outside Covin on the parties way to Drovic. He sold the party many goods, including a sword for Hayn, shield for Arthur, goggles for Zipleze, cloak for Armmyr, armour of weightlessness for Freya, a puzzler's ring for Tarin, and some extra potions for the party. Highlights

title: Draenol
content: [!infobox|right ] Draenol !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Dwarf | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Covin | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Draenol History Highlights

title: Faith Alchey
content: [!infobox|right ] Faith Alchey Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Female | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Drovic | | Shop | Alchey's Alchemicals | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Faith Alchey History Faith Alcy runs the alchemical shop Alcy's Alchemicals, located in the city of Drovic. The party encountered her on their trip to attend the King's Ball. She sold the party a few potions, namely a couple potions of animal speaking, greater healing potions, and speed potions. Before the party left, she mentioned to Arthur that Fish Folk took over the docks, where she would normally obtain clam tongue - an ingredient needed for a potion of giant size. Highlights

title: Gilmore
content: [!infobox|right ] Gilmore Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Anaheim | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Gilmore History Gilmore is an eccentric shopkeeper who specializes in the trade of magical items. He has helped Bad Company numerous times, once hiding the group in his basement at his shop after a run-in with the law. Highlights

title: Mikael
content: [!infobox|right ] Mikael !cover h-small Physical Information | | ---|---| | Age | Adult | | Gender | Male | | Race | Human | | Condition | Alive | Basic Information || ---|---| | Level | =this.level | | Class(es) | =this.class | | Standing | Friendly | | Location | Covin | Relationships | | ---| ---| | - | - | Mikael History Highlights

title: Armmyr Dopplet
content: [!infobox|right ] Armmyr Dopplet Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Male Race Changeling Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 10 Class(es) Ranger,Warlock Standing Friendly Location Party Player Eli Relationships Name Relationship Korbin Dopplet Brother Armmyr Dopplet History Highlights Attacked by Bento and Leo after leaving the party, having been dumped in the ocean. Found again by the party in the Underdark, under the city of Covin, promptly rejoining the group.

title: Arthur Maynard
content: [!infobox|right ] Arthur Maynard Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Male Race Human Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Paladin Standing Friendly Location Party Player Nick Relationships Name Relationship Morvello Adopted Father Abigail Maynard Birth Mother Arthur Maynard History Arthur was born to Abigail Maynard. During an attack, his future adopted father Morvello found them. After her death, Morvello took Arthur under the tutelage of himself and the Paladin Order of Cape Renozo. Taking on an Oath of Devotion under the god Heironeous, he would eventually make his way to Vindor and join up with a group of adventurers, later becoming known as Bad Company. He was killed in a fight against Inchcomb before being brought back to life via Barnar Dankil's revivify spell, but in the process lost an eye and had the side of his face scarred. Highlights Fought his mother, whom turned into a giant snake due to a curse, during her attack on Cape Renozo. Subsequently ended Morvello's curse that was cast on him from his mother. Abandoned his oath under Heironeous, finding new purpose with an Oath of Redemption under the god Sarenrae. Lost an eye in the fight against Inchcomb.

title: Freya Lorhalien
content: [!infobox|right ] Freya Lorhalien Physical Information Attribute Age Teenager Gender Female Race Eladrin Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Bard,Warlock Standing Friendly Location Party Player Don Relationships Name Relationship - - Freya Lorhalien History Bad Company first stumbled across Freya at The Spire, located in the north-east of Franzictini. Cowering after being shunted through a portal by her parents, the party brought her along with them - hoping to get her back to the Fey and back home. Eventually the party would have to travel through the Fey, where they found her village burnt to the ground. After an encounter with (forgot), she gained the ability from a powerful Ent, which allows her to plant seeds in various dimensions; These seeds would allow for travel between the dimensions. The party eventually split when half jumped into the portal on top of Mount Franz, which led to the Elemental Plane of Fire. She would remain with Zipleze Rimmore in Irridanel, where the two would disagree on the feasibility of Inchcomb's idea of transferring his mind to a robotic body. After Inchcomb turned evil and effectively destroyed Irridanel - in the process slaughtering many innocents - Freya would loathe Zipleze for what he helped cause. Highlights Killed by a bugbear during a fight in the underdark under Covin, and subsequently resurrected by Barnar.

title: Hayn Underfoot
content: [!infobox|right ] Hayn Underfoot Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Male Race Halfling Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Rogue,Warlock Standing Friendly Location Party Player Steven Relationships Name Relationship Eran Underfoot Brother Hayn Underfoot History Hayn was born alongside twin Eran in the town of Vindor. Despite similar environments, Eran would grow up to become a well respected, small time merchant in Vindor. Dissimilarly, Hayn grew up a peddler of illegal goods, a pickpocket, and a thief. Eventually, at behest of a lord of Vindor, he alongside a few others formed a party to attend to an issue effecting the region. Eventually, this party would form into the adventuring party Bad Company. Highlights The God of Thieves, Mask, provided a job to retrieve an artifact called The Globe. Hayn was chosen by the Matron of Ravens, providing him a touch of magic.

title: Khiramine Firanova
content: [!infobox|right ] Khiramine Firanova Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Male Race Half-Elf Condition Presumed Dead Basic Information Attribute Level 6 Class(es) Druid,Monk Standing Friendly Location Unknown Player Nathan Relationships Name Relationship Velania Firanova Sister Khiramine Firanova History Highlights

title: Kril
content: [!infobox|right ] Kril Physical Information Attribute Age Adult Gender Male Race Firbolg Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Fighter Standing Friendly Location Mount Franz Player Brophey Relationships Name Relationship - - Kril History Little is known on Kril, except that he eventually found shelter inside the vast tunnel system in Mount Franz. The party, Bad Company, would eventually stumble upon him on their trek up the mountain in search of Bento and Leo Denteli. Having been injured by Leo on their way up the mountain, he agreed to help the party up the mountain, and escorted them through the tunnels and to the peak. There, they fought Bento and Leo, whereupon he left the party, closing a portal to the Elemental Plane of Fire as the rest of them went inside in search of the sword Dawnbringer and a fragment of Godsbane. Highlights Ripped Orcus's horn from Leo's head, freeing him of his enthrallment. Stayed behind to close the portal into the Elemental Plane of Fire.

title: Tarin Bolirahn
content: [!infobox|right ] Tarin Bolirahn Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Male Race Elf Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Sorcerer Standing Friendly Location Party Player Jonathon Relationships Name Relationship Atlas Wife Tarin Bolirahn History Tarin Bolirahn met with Armmyr Dopplet on the road to Vindor, in search of answers about the disappearance of his hometown - Boab - as-well as a search for his partner Atlas. Alongside Armmyr, he and a few others would form an adventuring party - that would later be known as Bad Company - to help with a plague effecting Vindor. He formed an adversarial relationship with Leo Denteli, whom was the cause of Boab's disappearance, before making peace with him after the revelation of his enthrallment. Highlights

title: Velania Firanova
content: [!infobox|right ] Velania Firanova Physical Information Attribute Age Young Adult Gender Female Race Half-Elf Condition Alive Basic Information Attribute Level 12 Class(es) Druid,Cleric Standing Friendly Location Party Player Nathan Relationships Name Relationship Khiramine Firanova Brother Velania Firanova History Velania - alongside her brother Khiramine - grew up in the city of Menta, bordering the northern-most Great Forest. Their father belonged to The Council - the local government responsible for the safety of it's people and keeper's of information. She stumbled across the party, not yet known as Bad Company, after Khiramine had been transported away during the parties fight with Giorno. Sometime later, during a trip to Menta, the party was banished from returning and subsequently pursued by Menta troops. Highlights

It is theocratically ruled by the leader of the Paladin Order. History Highlights Party cured Morvello of his lycanthropic affliction. Killed the Serpent of Aldas Island near the harbors.

title: Nellis
content: [!infobox|right ] Nellis !cover h-small General Information | | ---|---| | Alias(es) | =this.alias | | Type | =this.type | | Ruler | =this.ruler | | Party Reputation | =this.reputation | | Population | Hamlet | Location Information || ---|---| | Continent | Franzictini | | Plane | Material Plane | | Region | =this.region | Notable Individuals | | ---| ---| | - | - | Nellis History Highlights

title: Brass
content: [!infobox|right ] Brass General Information | | ---|---| | Alias(es) | =this.alias | | Type | Monarchy | | Ruler | =this.ruler | | Party Reputation | Wanted | | Population | Metropolis | Location Information || ---|---| | Continent | Unknown | | Plane | Elemental Plane of Fire | | Region | Unknown | Notable Individuals | | ---| ---| | - | - | Brass History Highlights A fragment of Godsbane - the blade - was found in the lost city of Mem Nonnar attached to a colossal sized lava creature, whom the party speculate caused the destruction of Mem Nonnar after gaining powers from the fragment of Godsbane. Freed a unicorn from Idrisir's tower, with the unicorn eventually watching of Boab as it's protector. Killed Idrisir in his tower before leaving to the Material Plane.

title: Drovic
content: [!infobox|right ] Drovic General Information | | ---|---| | Alias(es) | =this.alias | | Type | Monarchy | | Ruler | Lord Drovic IV | | Party Reputation | Friendly | | Population | Metropolis | Location Information || ---|---| | Continent | Franzictini | | Plane | Material Plane | | Region | North-East | Notable Individuals | | ---| ---| | - | - | Drovic History Shops Electric Emporiums [!cards|1] [!infobox|right ] Drovic !cover h-small General Information | | ---|---| | Owner | =this.owner | | Location | =this.location | | Type | Monarchy | Notable Items | | ---| ---| | Ring of Evasion | Dust of Dryness | | Gem of Seeing | Universal Solvent | | Monk's Wraps | Chime of Opening | | Hat of Wizardry | Threaded Cane | | Scroll of Protection from Undead | Wand of Counterspell | Drovic History Lothar, a halfling male, sold the party some magical items before the King's Ball in Drovic. These included the Lantern of Revealing for Hayn, Nolzur's Marvelous Pigments for Tarin, and a Ring of Protection for Freya. Freya managed to trick her way into paying half price for the Ring of Protection with a sob story. title: Heart of Ironforge
content: [!infobox|right ] Heart of Ironforge !cover h-small General Information | | ---|---| | Owner | Dunar | | Location | Drovic | | Type | Blacksmith | Notable Items | | ---| ---| | - | - | Heart of Ironforge History Zipleze bought some steel and an unfinished returning shield from Dunar, the shopkeeper and owner of Heart of Ironforge. The party then proceeded to offload a bunch of old swords and weaponry to him. Highlights Freya asked Zipleze for a dagger for undisclosed reasons, before selling it immediately to Dunar for a measly 5 gold.

title: Mikael's General Goods
content: [!infobox|right ] Mikael's General Goods !cover h-small General Information | | ---|---| | Owner | Mikael | | Location | Giorna | | Type | General Goods | Notable Items | | ---| ---| | - | - | Mikael's General Goods History Shop is owned by an older, energetic man.
